sentences.english: The reason Burundi is so poor is because they have never really had any peaceful time between the everlasting civil wars.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家贫穷的真正原因是因为连绵不绝的内战。

sentences.english: The main reason of death was hemorrhagic shock.
sentences.chinese: 失血性休克是死亡的主要原因。

sentences.english: Part four elaborates the author's opinion about the basis of the criminal responsibility of the actio libera in cause.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，原因自由行为之可罚性基础的再思考。

sentences.english: Conclusions Uterine cavity and fallopian tube abnormalities were the important reason of female infertile.
sentences.chinese: 结论子宫腔及输卵管形态异常是不孕症的重要原因。

sentences.english: The report cited several societal and economic reasons for the jump.
sentences.chinese: 该报告引用了一些社会和经济原因解释这一跨越。

sentences.english: For these reasons, Provo tied for second-to-last inisland rankings published in the November/December 2007 issue of themagazine.
sentences.chinese: 由于这些原因，普罗伏在此榜单上位列倒数第二。

sentences.english: The reason I didn't score any points last year was because we were gamblers.
sentences.chinese: 去年我没有获得任何积分的原因是我们是赌棍。

sentences.english: Many reasons for nosebleeds, but about half of them can not find reason.
sentences.chinese: 流鼻血的原因很多，但是约有一半人找不出原因的。

sentences.english: Many reasons for nosebleeds, but about half of them can not find reason.
sentences.chinese: 流鼻血的原因很多，但是约有一半人找不出原因的。

sentences.english: Fourth, the failure is beyond the unit's will.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行为未达既遂是由于单位意志以外的原因。

sentences.english: Perhaps you can explain why the Dustmen want me dead.
sentences.chinese: 也许你能解释死亡者想要杀死我的原因。

sentences.english: I had a feeling we were at Portsea for some special reason of hers.
sentences.chinese: 我感到我们到港海是有她特殊的原因。

sentences.english: Polit error is the most common cause of plane crashes.
sentences.chinese: 飞机失事最常见的原因是驾驶不当。

sentences.english: Therefore, you have to think of the possibility that this was one of the reasons for domesticating dogs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你必须考虑这可能是驯化狗只的其中一个原因。

sentences.english: You know who's the reason for this big smile on my face?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我脸上绽露出的笑容，原因是什么吗？

sentences.english: Reasons for higher success rates among women are difficult to isolate.
sentences.chinese: 女人高成功率的原因很难去单独分析出。

definition: due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
